oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Carl and Pearl Butler Fact Sheet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Butler, Carl; Butler, Pearl; Offset printing;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A black and white negative taped to and framed by a masking sheet advertising facts about Carl and Pearl Butler, including their birthplace; major songs recorded; major albums recorded; movies, radio, and television shows they appeared on; record label; countries visited; and hobbies. The negative would have been used to create a corresponding printing plate.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:accessRights: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The image may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
